data: {"generalSituation":"The northeast monsoon will affect the coast of Guangdong in the next couple of days. It will be slightly cooler in the morning over the region. The band of clouds covering southern China will thin out gradually. Under the influence of a dry replenishment of northeast monsoon, the weather will be generally fine over southern China during the weekend to early next week. The temperature difference between day and night will be relatively large over inland areas. The broad area of low pressure now to the north of Yap is expected to develop gradually and move towards the vicinity of the Philippines in the next few days.","weatherForecast":[{"forecastDate":"20251203","week":"Wednesday","forecastWind":"North to northeast force 4 to 5, occasionally force 6 offshore at night.","forecastWeather":"Mainly cloudy.
